cfplot_colorbar¶

cfplot.cfplot_colorbar(colorbar_labels=None, colorbar_orientation=None, colorbar_position=None, colorbar_shrink=None, colorbar_space=None, cb_orient=None, colorbar_title=None, text_fontsize=None, text_fontweight=None, colorbar_text_up_down=None, colorbar_text_down_up=None, colorbar_drawedges=None, levs=None, colorbar_depth=None, verbose=None)[source]¶
cfplot_colorbar is the internal interface to the Matplotlib
colorbar routine

colorbar_labels=None - colorbar labels
colorbar_orientation=None - orientation ‘horizontal’ or ‘vertical’
colorbar_position=None - user specified colorbar position in normalised
plot coordinates
[left, bottom, width, height]
colorbar_shrink=None - scale colorbar along length, default = 1.0
colorbar_space=None - space for the colorbar, default = 0.1,
in normalised plot coordinates
cb_orient=None - orientation for colorbar, either ‘horizontal’ or ‘vertical’
colorbar_title=None - title for the colorbar
text_fontsize=None - font size for the colorbar text
text_fontweight=None - font weight for the colorbar text
colorbar_text_up_down=None - label division text up and down starting with up
colorbar_text_down_up=None - label division text down and up starting with down
colorbar_drawedges=None - Draw internal delimeter lines in colorbar
levs=None - colourbar levels
colorbar_depth=None - set height of colorbar - default = 0.015,
in normalised plot coordinates
verbose=None
